title: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Voestalpine plays down impact of U.S. steel tariffs, sees more exceptions
text: March 9, 2018 / 9:18 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago CORRECTED-BRIEF-Voestalpine plays down impact of U.S. steel tariffs, sees more exceptions Reuters Staff (Corrects third bullet point) March 9 (Reuters) - Austrian Steel Maker voestalpine : * VOESTALPINE - EXPECTS EU AND OTHERS TO REACT TO U.S. STEEL IMPORT TARIFFS; CONSEQUENCES IMPOSSIBLE TO ASSESS * VOESTALPINE - SEES OTHER EXCEPTIONS TO U.S. STEEL IMPORT TARIFFS AFTER NAFTA PARTNERS CANADA AND MEXICO * ONLY 3 PCT OF ITS TOTAL SALES ARE AFFECTED BY U.S. TARIFFS (INSTEAD OF “ARE IN U.S.”) Further company coverage: (Reporting by Douglas Busvine; Editing by Adrian Croft)
